content.rendered:
3PRIME performs hourly image editing in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and other graphic design & photo processing programs.

This service includes 2 billable hours of image editing or processing of any kind – cropping, collage, noise & dust reduction, background removal, product photo presentation, portrait cleanup, color cast removal and others.

excerpt.rendered: 3PRIME performs hourly image editing in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and other graphic design & photo processing programs. This service includes 2 billable hours of image editing or processing of any kind – cropping, collage, noise & dust reduction, background removal, product photo presentation, portrait cleanup, color cast removal and others.
